snippet: The fungus, Seiridium, causes cypress canker disease, which has felled up to 95 percent of the cypress trees in some timber plantations and forests across the globe.
lead_paragraph: The fungus, Seiridium, causes cypress canker disease, which has felled up to 95 percent of the cypress trees in some timber plantations and forests across the globe.

headline.main: Fungal Killer of Cypresses Originated in California
headline.seo: Seiridium, Fungal Killer of Cypresses Worldwide, Is Traced to California
headline.print_headline: Fungal Killer Of Cypresses Originated In California
